static void AppESMIntrISR (void *handle)
 This Interrupt Service Routine for ESM interrupt. More...
 
int main (void)
 

Detailed Description

This file contains ESM test code.

ESM operational mode is set to normal mode for group 1. EVE reset interrupt is enabled from group 1 and it's priority is set as high level interrupt.

Function Documentation
